cards.title: Co-op
cards.info: My co-op experiences have tended to revolve around full-stack development, in a variety of industries, most recently the AdOps industry. I hope to expand into biotechnologies in the future.

cards.title: Exchange
cards.info: Enjoyed an exchange to Danmarks Tekniske Universitet (DTU) from January 2017 - May 2018.

cards.title: Engineering Society Executive
cards.info: I was VP Communications of the Waterloo Engineering Society managing a commissioner and five groups of directors from August 2016 - December 2017.

cards.title: Provincial and National Advocacy
cards.info: I was previously a voting member on the Engineering Student Societies' Council of Ontario (ESSCO), and the Canadian Federation of Engineering Students (CFES).

cards.title: Travel
cards.info: I love to travel, and I've managed to visit 15 beautiful countries and many more cities.

cards.title: Orientation Week
cards.info: I have been an orientation week leader since my second year as a Big, Huge, and Edcom.

cards.title: Interests
cards.info: I enjoy board games, hiking, painting, learning new languages, and hanging with friends in our student lounge, POETS.
